solution_line_template: Yella can use the computer {hours_per_day_this_week} x {days_in_week} = <<{hours_per_day_this_week}*{days_in_week}={usage_this_week}>>{usage_this_week} hours for this week.

Therefore, Yella's computer usage for this week is {usage_last_week} - {usage_this_week} = <<{usage_last_week}-{usage_this_week}={difference}>>{difference} hours lesser than her computer usage last week.
